description: 3 times the size of the average Amanto, the 3rd generation queen of Planet Gorilla. Due to deteriorated diplomatic ties with Earth, marriage between Commander http://anidb.net/ch1657 [Kondou Isao] and the princess was mooted to improve the diplomatic relationship. During wedding ceremony, which involves consummation of the marriage on the spot, http://anidb.net/ch1657 [Shimura Tae] gatecrashed the party to presumably rescue the minors, namely http://anidb.net/ch1163 [Shimura Shinpachi] and http://anidb.net/ch1164 [Kagura] from having to watch such an act, marriage therefore did not materialize.
name: Bubbles-oujo
